dict.acceptation: signal handling equipment 信号处理设备；sodium heat engine 钠压发动机；standard hydrogen electrode 标准氢电极；

sent.orig: 'Oops, that's torn it,' she thought, as she realized she'd ruined the surprise.
sent.trans: “ 啊呀，糟糕。” 她想，她意识到自己把这个惊喜给破坏掉了。

sent.orig: As soon as she realized she had a particular shortcoming, she resolutely overcame it.
sent.trans: 她一发现自己的毛病，就坚决改正。

sent.orig: At first, she decided to go to the police, but fearing that she would never see Rastus again——the letter had made that quite clear——she changed her mind.
sent.trans: 起初她决定去警察局，但是由于害怕再也见不到拉斯特斯了——那封信已经把这一点说得相当清楚——她改变了主意。

sent.orig: At first,she decided to go to the police,but fearing that she would never see Rastus again—the letter had made that quite clear—she changed her mind.
sent.trans: 起初，她决定去警察局，但是她由于担心再也见不到拉斯特斯了—那封信说得相当清楚—她改变了主意。

sent.orig: I just kept mum when she asked me where Ben was. She'd be furious if she knew.
sent.trans: 她问我本在哪里，我没有告诉她。如果她知道了，一定非常生气。
